definition: Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
lit. Mt Zhongnan is a shortcut to a ministerial job (idiom); fig. to take a shortcut to promotion

sentences.english: In 1996 to enter the draw Zhongnanshan Zen education classes.
sentences.chinese: 於1996年進入終南山禪畫班進修。

sentences.english: Yamamoto is the birthplace of Taoism upon one day, immortal fog filled.
sentences.chinese: 終南山本是道教的發源地之一，整日仙霧繚繞。

sentences.english: In 1999, left to return to Kunming after Zhongnanshan concentrate on creativity.
sentences.chinese: 於1999年離開終南山回到昆明後專心於創作。

sentences.english: While the second ice located in Zhongnanshan Shengjing, icing is not year-round.
sentences.chinese: 而太乙冰洞地處終南勝境，洞內積冰更是終年不化。

definition: southern states of Wu and Chu/the middle and lower Yangtze valley
to visit places famous for their scenery
Jiange county in Guangyuan 廣元|广元[Guang3 yuan2], Sichuan
lit. woodcutter's family/humble background/poor family background
past events/relics from a former age/ruins
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
